sentences.en: Amid this drabness, though, was a surprising little oasis.
sentences.cn: 在这令人乏味的市场里, 却还是有令人惊奇的小绿洲.

sentences.en: But for enough influence or money, at least in this obscure oasis, Paris was still Paris.
sentences.cn: 但是只要有足够的权势或金钱, 至少在这个不为人知的绿州里, 巴黎还是巴黎.

sentences.en: Disaster! The Oasis that you were looking for is dried up!
sentences.cn: 大难临头! 你拼命找寻的绿洲已经干涸!

sentences.en: In every desert of trial, God has an oasis of comfort.
sentences.cn: 在试炼的沙漠中, 上帝预备安慰的绿洲.

sentences.en: It hovered before his eyes like the mirage of an oasis.
sentences.cn: 它在他眼前晃动，好像海市蜃楼里的绿洲。

sentences.en: Mr. Cremona's barbershop was an oasis of beauty and good will.
sentences.cn: 老克的理发店恍如一块美丽亲善的绿洲.

sentences.en: Stephen Miller, chief executive of Oasis, said: Where are traditional carriers most vulnerable?
sentences.cn: 甘泉航空( Oasis )首席执行官斯蒂芬?米勒(StephenMiller)表示: 传统运营商最薄弱的环节在哪里?

sentences.en: The immaculately tended gardens are an oasis in the midst of Cairo's urban sprawl.
sentences.cn: 在开罗不断扩张的都市版图内，这些被悉心照料的花园成了一片世外桃源。

sentences.en: The Oasis was off the glamorous strip , far removed from the more famous hote ls.
sentences.cn: 绿洲旅馆并不在繁华的闹市区, 它离那些更有名气的旅馆很远.

sentences.en: The park was an oasis of peace.
sentences.cn: 这座公园是个宁静宜人的去处。

sentences.en: The town was an oasis of prosperity a desert of poverty.
sentences.cn: 该镇是“贫穷”荒漠中的一块繁荣的“绿洲”.

sentences.en: The town was an oasis of prosperity in a desert of poverty.
sentences.cn: 该镇是贫穷荒漠中的一块繁荣的"绿洲".

sentences.en: They stopped for the night at an oasis.
sentences.cn: 他们在沙漠中的绿洲停下来过夜.

sentences.en: This desert of unattractiveness has its oasis.
sentences.cn: 在这一片枯燥无味的沙漠上,也有一座绿洲.

sentences.en: WS - Reliability - An OASIS standard protocol for reliable messaging between two Web services.
sentences.cn: 的WS - 可靠性 - 绿洲标准协议提供可靠的信息网络服务之间.

words.tran_cn: [地理]绿洲；舒适的地方；令人宽慰的事物

trans.tran_cn: （沙漠中的）绿洲，（困苦中）令人快慰的地方（或时刻），乐土，宜人之地，慰藉物
trans.tran_en: a place with water and trees in a desert
